articles.content: Confirming a new species of octopus usually involves lab tests and dissections. Not so with the Grimpoteuthis imperator dumbo octopus that has just been identified, with non-invasive scanning doing a… [+3145 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Rahal
articles.title: Michigan adds 4,698 cases, 121 deaths from COVID-19, ends run of weekly infection increases - The Detroit News
articles.description: The latest figures bring the state's total number of cases to 819,320 and deaths to 17,289 since the virus was first detected in March 2020, according to the state Department of Health and Human Services.
articles.content:
Correction: The daily case and death tallies were incorrect in the headlines of an earlier version.
Michigan on Saturday added 4,698 new cases and 121 deaths from the coronavirus, ending a run of ei… [+7422 chars]

articles.title: It’s still too soon to go back to normal, St. Louis area doctors say - STLtoday.com
articles.description: Dr. Alex Garza said there is an ‘understandable temptation’ to let up on preventive measures, but it is too soon to do so.
